arcade.env.comp

Class Site

  • java.lang.Object
    • arcade.env.comp.Site
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GraphSites.GraphSite, PatternSites.PatternSite, SourceSites.SourceSite

    abstract class Site
extends java.lang.Object
    Specification of molecular details for Sites.

    A Site contains the correct set of environment lattices for a given molecule. Molecule codes are defined in Simulation.

    Since:
    2.3
    Version:
    2.3.0

      Array holding changes in concentration
      (package private) double[][][] prev
      Array holding previous concentration values

      Site(int code, double[][][] delta, double[][][] current, double[][][] previous)

    • Constructor Detail

      • Site

        Site(int code,
     double[][][] delta,
     double[][][] current,
     double[][][] previous)
        Creates a Site for the given molecule associated with a current, previous, and delta array.
        Parameters:
        code - the molecule code
        delta - the array holding change in concentration
        current - the array holding current concentrations for current tick
        previous - the array holding previous concentrations for previous tick
